articles.author: Richard Asher
articles.title: Puig suggests Marc Marquez free to opt out of Honda MotoGP contract - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Honda MotoGP boss Alberto Puig has suggested that the team’s talismanic rider Marc Marquez would be free to leave the team despite the four-year deal he signed in 2020.
articles.content:
Puig made the comments shortly after the team announced that Marquez will not take part in todays Dutch GP as a result of the injuries picked up in a spate of crashes last time out in Germany.

articles.description: The oddities of the Portland E-Prix weren't limited to what happened on track. Here are our winners and losers from a bizarre Formula E race.
